attributes.action: SCRAP THE AUTOMATED TELEPHONE SYSTEM USED BY COMPANIES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having recently been divorced resulting in me moving home I had cause to ring numerous organisations and companies and in form them of my change of circumstances.
Everybody I had to contact operated an automated calling system, the avergae waiting time was over 5 minutes, one call lasted 17 minutes.
This automated systemt should be scrapped and the phone only answered when somebody is free, all the time a person is on hold they are being charged with all the profits going to the companies.

rejection.details: Please re-draft without the CAPITALS as they make it hard for people to read
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
